ncnnqat package¶

Subpackages¶

  • ncnnqat package
    • Subpackages
    • Module contents

Module contents¶

quantize aware training package for Neural Network Inference Engine(NNIE) on pytorch.

ncnnqat.freeze_bn(m, freeze_bn_affine=True)¶
Freeze batch normalization.

reference: https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.08342

Args:

  • m (nn.module): torch module

  • freeze_bn_affine (bool, optional): Freeze affine scale and

translation factor or not. Defaults: True.

ncnnqat.merge_freeze_bn(model)¶

merge batch norm’s weight into convolution, then freeze it.

Args:

model (nn.module): model.

Returns:

[nn.module]: model.

ncnnqat.register_quantization_hook(model, quant_weight=True, quant_activation=True)¶

register quantization hook for model.

Args:

model (Module): Module.

Returns:

Module: self

ncnnqat.save_table(torch_model, onnx_path='model.onnx', table='model.table')¶
ncnnqat.unquant_weight(m)¶

unquantize weight before update weight, avoid training turbulence.

Args:

  • m (nn.module): torch module.
